category.catText: Explore our curated collections of premium furniture designed to elevate your space.
category.curtainsText: Elegant drapes and curtains to frame your windows.
category.sofasText: Comfortable and stylish sofas for your living space.

aboutUs.heading: About Us â€“ Wahaj
aboutUs.content: Wahaj is a brand specializing in custom-made furniture and finishing. We offer a smart selection experience that saves you the hassle of visiting showrooms, through a private fitting studio or home visit. We have over 7 years of manufacturing experience and are committed to high quality with a 10-year guarantee against foam sagging.
